Questionnaire.QuestionnaireDescription: A 10-item questionnaire assessing how hearing difficulties affect daily life.
Questions: 1. Do you have difficulty hearing when someone speaks in a whisper?
2. Do you feel handicapped by a hearing problem?
3. Does a hearing problem cause you difficulty when visiting friends, relatives or neighbours?
4. Does a hearing problem cause you difficulty when in a restaurant with relatives or friends?
5. Does a hearing problem cause you to feel embarrassed when you meet new people?
6. Does a hearing problem cause you to feel frustrated when talking to members of your family?
7. Does a hearing problem cause you to attend religious services less often than you would like?
8. Does a hearing problem cause you to have arguments with family members?
9. Does a hearing problem cause you difficulty when listening to TV or radio?
10. Do you feel that any difficulty with your hearing limits or hampers your social life?
